title: Authorize Request
description: Authorize current WebSocket connection to act on behalf of the owner of a given token. Must precede requests that need to access client account, for example purchasing and selling contracts or viewing portfolio.

authorize.description: Authentication token. May be retrieved from brands Manager API.

passthrough.description: Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: Used to map request to response.
